name: Leechbug
description:
A 3D action game set in an alien sea, where you are a parasite trying to climb to the top of the food chain by possessing sea creatures. Gather a massive swarm of fellow parasites to attack bigger fish, while maintaining your distance from your swarm to avoid being fed on.

  • Collect a swarm of parasites that follow you around
  • Possess bigger fish by weakening it with a swarm attack
  • Traverse the layers of an alien sea by possessing creatures that can survive that layer
